home.title: Furnish your office
home.description1: Provide your spaces with stylish, ergonomic furniture on a flexible subscription model
home.description2: no upfront costs, easy upgrades, and hassle-free maintenance.

calculator.title: Compare prices

explore.description1: Explore flexible office furniture, from ergonomic seating to functional desks,
explore.description2: we offer everything you need to create aproductive and comfortable workspace.
explore.eshop: If you want to select products individually instead of as a set, you can visit our online store.

howItWorks.description: Start using furniture on a subscription basis for your office, and from now on, expanding your team or moving to a new office will no longer be a hassle.
howItWorks.1stepDescription: Contact us by filling out your personal/business details and the message field in the form to request furniture.
howItWorks.2stepDescription: We'll contact you and discuss the details and understand your demand.
howItWorks.3stepDescription: You will receive a subscription offer from us. Now you have furniture for which you pay a small amount monthly.

eshop.description: Contact us to purchase furniture, and we can also create a personalized solution for you from furniture by more than 20 manufacturers if you can't find exactly what suits you in our store.

eco.description2: Our business model incorporates the principles of the
eco.description2,2: where the product is not discarded and does not end up as waste polluting the
eco.description3,2: after the subscription ends and is passed on to a new customer.
eco.description4: And if the furniture was purchased, we are ready to
eco.description4,2: after use and give it a new life!

faq.1question: What is Furnify and how does it work?
faq.1answer: Furnify is a company that allows you to acquire furniture through a subscription by paying a monthly fee. Choose the furniture you like, contact us, and we will send you an offer. If you wanted to purchase specific furniture that you don't see on our website, —Åontact us to purchase furniture, and we can also create a personalized solution for you from furniture by more than 20 manufacturers.
faq.2question: What types of furniture can be rented on a subscription basis?
faq.2answer: With our subscription service, you can rent furniture for offices, hotels, or homes: office chairs, office desks, under-desk storage cabinets and other office items.
faq.3question: Why is office furniture on subscription more advantageous than traditional purchasing?
faq.3answer: With our service, you don't need to spend a large sum of money to set up a new office. You only pay a monthly fee, which is much more convenient. Additionally, we provide furniture maintenance for minor repairs, as well as free delivery and assembly.
faq.4question: Is it possible to simply purchase office furniture from you instead of renting it through a subscription?
faq.4answer: Yes, we also offer our clients the option to buy furniture outright with the possibility of a buyback. In other words, when the time comes and you need to get rid of the furniture, you can offer it back to us.
faq.5question: Is it possible to upgrade or add new furniture during an active subscription?
faq.5answer: Yes, you can upgrade your furniture or add new pieces during your subscription.
faq.6answer: Delivery and assembly of furniture are handled by our company free of charge.
faq.7question: Is it possible to cancel the subscription, and what are the terms?
faq.7answer: The minimum subscription period with us is 6 months. To cancel the subscription, you must notify our company 2 months in advance. We do not have any penalties or sanctions.

contactModal.title: Want to subscribe, buy or ask question?
contactModal.description: Fill out the form and we will respond within 3 business hours.
